title: Bad Piggies 1.0 + Patch
description:
English

Note: If your antivirus detects the patch (keygen, crack, activation) is virus, do not worry it's only a false alarm. Please disable it temporarily and then continue Activation Game.

1.	Install the game by clicking on the file, Bad Piggies 1.0.exe which is in the folder: Installer (Instalador).
2.	After finishing the installation, copy the file Patch.exe, which is in the Patch (Run it in Administrator Mode De). Then click on Patch.
3.	Ready Be Happy.
